content: We had a cash balance of $108 million as of December 31, '22, after funding $15 million of seed capital for Acadian's Equity Alternatives platform and fully paying off Acadian's seasonal credit facility. And it reflects essentially where the market is today, what our -- we are going to invest more in these new initiatives that we touched on earlier on people as well as data and infrastructure on credit, equity alternatives, multi-asset class, ESG, all of these areas.
